Articles.Content:
I almost had one vehicle from each part of the armed forces types of vehicles (Sea, Air, Land). Because giant ships are FPS pigs I decided to make a mini version of the HMS Hood.[img]http://i.imgur.com/D6xwfZ2.png[/img]

(Cheats only used to deliver Hood to water)

Without funnels filled it gets halfway to the Abandoned Airstrip! So can get pretty far for its size.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0zX77r9.png[/img]

It leans to the side a little, but that's probably to do with the engines so yeah.
This is pre 1.0.5 so...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dya3hxh.png[/img]
Why is it always I get decent views but no replies?

[quote name='Spacetraindriver']Why is it always I get decent views but no replies?[/QUOTE]

It's no use wondering, replies can vary from release time/date, interest, mods etc. I looked at it when you posted, thought 'cool' but it's last version and I have to get on and finish my destroyer, which is quite a bit bigger.

[quote name='Spacetraindriver']Why is it always I get decent views but no replies?[/QUOTE]

I feel your pain.

Very cool,

Although, I'd hardly call it a mini... (I haven't seen your other normal one, just saying;))

Happy Flying
YargJay9991
